title: Math Games for Kids | Free Online Educational Math Games | EduGameHQ
description: Play free math games for kids aged 6-18. Learn numbers, counting, logic, and problem-solving through fun interactive games from CrazyGames.

games.title: Count Masters: Stickman Games
games.description: Count Masters: Stickman Games is a fast-paced running game where you gather a growing army of stickmen to clash against rival crowds. Navigate through obstacles, choose the best paths to multiply your numbers, and lead your team to victory. Battle fierce opponents, defeat the King-stickman, and claim the castle in an action-packed race filled with strategy and excitement!

games.title: Five-O
games.description: Five-O puts a numerical twist on the classic crossword board game! Instead of letters, you place number tiles, forming sequences that must add up to multiples of five, with no more than five tiles per sequence. Think strategically, maximize your bonuses, and outscore your opponent in Five-O!

games.title: Merge the Numbers
games.description: Merge the Numbers is a logic game based on connecting numbers. Merge the numbers and reach the highest score!

2048 is a single-player sliding tile puzzle game developed by Gabriele Cirulli. Merge tiles with the same power of 2 to get the total sum. The goal is to keep merging tiles this way until you reach 2048!

games.title: Numbers Arena
games.description: Numbers Arena is a math, snake, and merge game altogether in one game. The green number means pluses, the red number means minus, and the yellow x2 is to multiply your number. If your number is higher than your enemies, then you can run up to it to break it. Collect gray numbers enemies drop to grow even more! You will win when you reach the right number. Collect numbers to be the biggest in the arena and smash the rest of your enemies!

games.title: Stone Puzzle Games
games.description: Stone Puzzle Game is a brain-teasing experience that blends three unique puzzle styles into one captivating game. Challenge yourself with “Stone Shoot” by merging number stones, connect colorful stones in “Stone Connect,” and test your math skills in “Stone Merge” by combining numbers to form higher values. Engage in a variety of challenges to train your mind and master each puzzle type!

games.title: Cypher - Code Breaker
games.description: Cypher - Code Breaker is a brain-teasing logic game where you decipher hidden digits using clever clues and formulas. Each symbol masks a number, and your job is to reveal the correct combination without guessing. Inspired by classics like Sudoku and Mastermind, this puzzle challenges you to think critically and find the one true solution.

games.title: Hero Castle War: Tower Attack
games.description: Hero Castle War: Tower Attack is a 2D action game where you play as Hiro, a ninja trained by master Daiki and his daughter Hana in a secret ninja village. When the vampire king Dakura discovers the village, he kidnaps Hana and leaves his army of corrupted ninjas, giants, dragons, and witches to guard her. Despite the formidable foes, Hiro is determined to rescue Hana. Why did Dakura take Hana? No one knows. Help Hiro reach the highest tower and rescue his beloved now!
